name: Tricky Treats (Emily, Haley Vlahos, CharlietheCoder, Incredible_Matt, namank100, MirrorCube, JM36)
name_original: Tricky Treats (Emily, Haley Vlahos, CharlietheCoder, Incredible_Matt, namank100, MirrorCube, JM36)
description:
Ah it's Halloween Night and it's that time to delve into piles of delicious TREATS!! Play as the elegant Dapper Boi to obtain the candy around the neighborhood! But wait! Watch out and hide from those definitely not copyrighted sus enemies (smh...)  bullies so they don't hurt you! >_< 

Tricky Treats is a 2.5d single-player survival game. Collect as many candies and see how long you can survive the night! 

------------------------------------------------------------------

Control schemes:

- Movement: WASD "W" to move up, "A" to move left, "D" to move right, "S" to move down

- Walk into a bush to hide from enemies

- "F key" for loading the next level 

- "T key" to pause/restart/quit game 

Game Jam team members:

Producers: Charlie Xu &  Naman Khurana

Game Designers: Charlie Xu,  Naman Khurana, & Matthew Pickens

Environmental Design: Matthew Pickens

UI/UX: Josh Castillo, Joyce Mai

Programmers:  Josh Castillo, Joyce Mai,  Haley Vlahos,  &  Naman Khurana

Audio: Emily Chavez & Haley Vlahos
